front.title: IPv6 Extensions for DNS Plug and Play

abstract.t: This document proposes automatic configuration of domain name (FQDN) for IPv6 nodes using Domain Name Auto-Configuration (called 6DNAC) as a part of IPv6 plug and play feature. 6DNAC allows the automatic registration of domain name and corresponding IPv6 Addresses with the DNS server. In order to provide 6DNAC function, Neighbor Discovery Protocol [2461] will be used. Moreover, 6DNAC does not require any changes to the existing DNS system.
